sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; declare function init_plugins(): any; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { forma: FormGroup | any; constructor( ){} ngOnInit(){ init_plugins(); this.forma = new FormGroup({ nombre: new FormControl(null, Validators.required), correo: new FormControl(null, [Validators.required, Validators.email]), password: new FormControl(null, Validators.required), password2: new FormControl(null, Validators.required), condiciones: new FormControl(false), }); } }
